plays.text: Goal scored by Kyle Calder assisted by Alex Zhamnov and Tony Amonte
Penalty to Kyle Calder 2 minutes for Kneeing Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for Interference MIKE PELUSO
Penalty to Andrew Ference 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Alex Zhamnov assisted by Kyle Calder and Tony Amonte
Penalty to Ryan VandenBussche 2 minutes for Tripping Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Tony Amonte 5 minutes for Fighting Josef Melichar
Penalty to Josef Melichar 5 minutes for Fighting Tony Amonte
Penalty to Alex Zhamnov 2 minutes for Roughing Andrew Ference
Penalty to Andrew Ference 2 minutes for Roughing Alex Zhamnov
Penalty to Alex Zhamnov 2 minutes for Holding Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Diving Alex Zhamnov
